Intervention Agents¶

BaseInterventionActorPolicy¶

class causal_rl_bench.intervention_agents.BaseInterventionActorPolicy(**kwargs)[source]¶

This class indicates the interface of a meta actor

act(variables_dict)[source]¶

This functions enables the meta actor to decide on specific interventions. :param variables_dict: The current dict of variables that it can intervene on with

their current values. (this can be a two level dict)

Returns

interventions_dict -- Dict of variables that the meta actor decided to intervene on with the corresponding values.

Return type

dict

get_params()[source]¶
Returns

initialize(env)[source]¶

This functions allows the intervention agent to query things from the env, such as intervention spaces or to have access to sampling funcs for goals..etc :param env: :type env: Env
